verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, which stretcheth <WH5186> <WH8802> forth the heavens <WH8064>, and layeth the foundation <WH3245> <WH8801> of the earth <WH776>, and formeth <WH3335> <WH8802> the spirit <WH7307> of man <WH120> within <WH7130> him.

Behold, I will make <WH7760> <WH8802> Yerushalayim <WH3389> a cup <WH5592> of trembling <WH7478> unto all the people <WH5971> round about <WH5439>, when they shall be in the siege <WH4692> both against Y'hudah <WH3063> and against Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And in that day <WH3117> will I make <WH7760> <WH8799> Yerushalayim <WH3389> a burdensome <WH4614> stone <WH68> for all people <WH5971>: all that burden <WH6006> <WH8802> themselves with it shall be cut in pieces <WH8295> <WH8800> <WH8295> <WH8735>, though all the people <WH1471> of the earth <WH776> be gathered together <WH622> <WH8738> against it.

In that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, I will smite <WH5221> <WH8686> every horse <WH5483> with astonishment <WH8541>, and his rider <WH7392> <WH8802> with madness <WH7697>: and I will open <WH6491> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869> upon the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and will smite <WH5221> <WH8686> every horse <WH5483> of the people <WH5971> with blindness <WH5788>.

And the governors <WH441> of Y'hudah <WH3063> shall say <WH559> <WH8804> in their heart <WH3820>, The inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall be my strength <WH556> in the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> their 'Elohim <WH430>.

In that day <WH3117> will I make <WH7760> <WH8799> the governors <WH441> of Y'hudah <WH3063> like an hearth <WH3595> of fire <WH784> among the wood <WH6086>, and like a torch <WH3940> of fire <WH784> in a sheaf <WH5995>; and they shall devour <WH398> <WH8804> all the people <WH5971> round about <WH5439>, on the right hand <WH3225> and on the left <WH8040>: and Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall be inhabited <WH3427> <WH8804> again in her own place, even in Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

The YY <WH3068> also shall save <WH3467> <WH8689> the tents <WH168> of Y'hudah <WH3063> first <WH7223>, that the glory <WH8597> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> and the glory <WH8597> of the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> do not magnify <WH1431> <WH8799> themselves against Y'hudah <WH3063>.

In that day <WH3117> shall the YY <WH3068> defend <WH1598> <WH8686> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>; and he that is feeble <WH3782> <WH8737> among them at that day <WH3117> shall be as David <WH1732>; and the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> shall be as 'Elohim <WH430>, as the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> before <WH6440> them.
And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that I will seek <WH1245> <WH8762> to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> all the nations <WH1471> that come <WH935> <WH8802> against Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And I will pour <WH8210> <WH8804> upon the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>, and upon the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, the spirit <WH7307> of grace <WH2580> and of supplications <WH8469>: and they shall look <WH5027> <WH8689> upon me whom they have pierced <WH1856> <WH8804>, and they shall mourn <WH4553> for him, as one mourneth <WH5594> <WH8804> for his only <WH3173> son, and shall be in bitterness <WH4843> <WH8687> for him, as one that is in bitterness <WH4843> <WH8687> for his firstborn <WH1060>.
In that day <WH3117> shall there be a great <WH1431> <WH8799> mourning <WH4553> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, as the mourning <WH4553> of Hadadrimmon <WH1910> in the valley <WH1237> of Megiddon <WH4023>.

And the land <WH776> shall mourn <WH5594> <WH8804>, every <WH4940> family <WH4940> apart <WH905>; the family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> apart, and their wives <WH802> apart; the family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of Natan <WH5416> apart, and their wives <WH802> apart;
The family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of Levi <WH3878> apart, and their wives <WH802> apart; the family <WH4940> of Shimei <WH8097> apart, and their wives <WH802> apart;
All the families <WH4940> that remain <WH7604> <WH8737>, every family <WH4940> apart, and their wives <WH802> apart.
